General.Name: Qinghai Salt Lake Industry Co.Ltd
General.Description: Qinghai Salt Lake Industry Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells potash fertilizer and lithium salts in China. It offers potassium chloride and lithium carbonate. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Golmud, China.

8.Name: Mr. Shun  Li
8.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
